ygData.subject: Re: Derkal, Using the gemchopper...
ygData.msgSnippet: more ideas: Not fully implemented yet (yeh, i m a cynic :) ) Quest item (anyone try giving one to the gnome in rathe mts who cuts gems?) Mebbe used with
ygData.messageBody:
more ideas:
Not fully implemented yet (yeh, i'm a cynic :) )
Quest item (anyone try giving one to the gnome in rathe mts who cuts gems?)
Mebbe used with thickened mana potion of some sort to make some magic
item...no way to guess what skill or item without recipe tho :(

i'm guessing not implemented, but wouldn't be surprised by quest item after
what they did with the barkeeps compendium...
might be an ingredient in some new jewelcrafted stuff, probably only works
with a limited number of gem/metal combinations tho, like cams in fletching

Xillitil

>From: sragan@...
>
>Here are a few ideas for what I think it might be used for. And remember,
>the chopper probably has to be used be *US* tinkers in *OUR* toolbox to be
>effective.
>
>IDEAS:
>Used by Jewelers to enhance jewelry making (probably not)
>Used by Jewelers to enhance or split a gem into multiple gems (disproved)
>Used by *US* tinkers in a tool box on a gem to enhance or split a gem
>(possible)
>Used by *US* to enhance some other unknown item (possible as well)
>
